transcript.text:
￼












Local Country-Specific Settings

3 min
the first thing you need to do after your store setup is to update some basic settings in your onprintshop store as per your local country settings click on the below listed topics to configure country/state selection the onprintshop admin panel comes with pre configured countries (usa, nz, mexico, philippines, etc ) of the world depending on which countries/states you want to offer your products to or allow customers from specific locations to place orders, you can manage these countries/states from the admin panel tax/vat settings while selling your products, you might want to charge taxes on your sales as per the government policy you can set tax rates in different ways – flat tax rate, country wise, state wise (country and state), or area wise (country and zip code) languages you may have customers from all over the world and considering that you may want to have a multi lingual site, you can support your store in multiple languages with our ops admin panel support your store in multiple languages please note that if you have enabled multiple languages, you also need to set up the content, website text, product data, etc for each language currency when you have a global level client base, your clients may get confused while they are looking at the price calculation of the products to avoid this confusion, you can support and manage the multi currency in your store
Did this page help you?


PREVIOUS
Starting with OnPrintShop
NEXT
Setup And Configure Products
